SummaryEnglish: The would-be hijinks of the mischievous Matsuno sextuplets are hijacked from episode one by colorful buck-toothed con man Iyami and Chibita, his bald munchkin sidekick. Nearly every episode is a standalone comedy cavalcade with the above cast as well as other quirky locals who show up in a number of different roles as the series shifts effortlessly between time periods and genres, but in most cases, Iyami and Chibita are front and center as partners in crime, a couple of sad sacks scraping by but carrying out scammy schemes in order to get rich quick

1.TitleEnglish: あっぱれチビ太の鬼たいじザンス

2.TitleEnglish: おそ松くん スイカの星からこんにちはザンス!

3.TitleEnglish: おそ松くん イヤミはひとり風の中

1.SummaryEnglish: Failing salesman Iyami tries robbing Osomatsu's house, but is foiled by the rambunctious sextuplets.
1.TitleJapanese: シェーッ! 六つ子ザンス!

2.SummaryEnglish: A fortune-teller tells Iyami that three terrible things are going to happen to him that day.
2.TitleJapanese: うらないは、こりごりザンス

3.SummaryEnglish: Iyami, a quack doctor in a small town, schemes to discredit his more successful rival.
3.TitleJapanese: 天才イヤミの化け薬ザンス!

4.SummaryEnglish: Iyami's ballet school is putting on a performance in three days, but amid backstage turmoil, the prima ballerina keeps changing.Chibita falls in love with Dekapan's "daughter," Hanako, unaware that she's actually a pig
4.TitleJapanese: シェ〜ッ!! ミーはバレリーナ

5.TitleEnglish: Chibita's Love Falls with the Flowers
5.SummaryEnglish: Chibita falls in love with Dekapan's "daughter," Hanako, unaware that she's actually a pig.
5.TitleJapanese: チビ太の恋はハナと散るダス

6.SummaryEnglish: Iyami fakes his own death in order to collect consolation money.
6.TitleJapanese: ナンマイダでもうけるザンス

7.SummaryEnglish: Chibita secretly takes care of an abandoned baby.
7.TitleJapanese: チビ太はママになりました

8.SummaryEnglish: Chibita gets a hat that turns him into a good boy when he wears it.
8.TitleJapanese: 変身! チビ太のふしぎな帽子

9.TitleEnglish: Making Easy Money with a Secondhand Store-zansu!
9.SummaryEnglish: Iyami and Chibita are deceptive secondhand item dealers who are aiming for one big score.
9.TitleJapanese: 古道具屋でボロもうけザンス

10.SummaryEnglish: A Shinigami enlists Iyami's help to hasten the death of a sickly Osomatsu.
10.TitleJapanese: 地獄の死神セールスマン!!

11.TitleEnglish: Even Behind Bars, Iyami Never Learns!
11.SummaryEnglish: Iyami and Chibita are handcuffed together and on the run from the law after breaking out of jail.
11.TitleJapanese: ヘイの中でもこりないイヤミ

12.TitleEnglish: The Great Iyami-sensei, the Popular Author!
12.SummaryEnglish: Iyami is a failed novelist who becomes popular when he starts writing outrageous lies about his neighbors.
12.TitleJapanese: 売れっ子小説家イヤミ大先生

13.TitleEnglish: A Castle Moved In Next Door!
13.SummaryEnglish: When an Edo-era castle suddenly comes to town, the local citizens rebel against their would-be ruler, Chibita.
13.TitleJapanese: お城が隣に引っ越してきた!

14.SummaryEnglish: Aliens intent on invading Earth kidnap Osomatsu and Choromatsu, then replace them.
14.TitleJapanese: エイリアンをやっつけろ!

15.TitleEnglish: Getting Your Life Saved is Expensive-zansu!
15.SummaryEnglish: After Iyami saves Osomatsu's life, he demands constant, eternal gratitude.
15.TitleJapanese: 命の恩は高くつくザンス

16.SummaryEnglish: Chibita uses a secret formula to shrink Osomatsu and his brothers as payback for mocking him.
16.TitleJapanese: 節約? 省エネ? ミニ六つ子!

17.SummaryEnglish: Hatabou must summon courage to stand up for himself after being jailed for one of Iyami's misdeeds.

18.SummaryEnglish: Chibita is a former safecracker who's trying to go straight, but a detective, Iyami, keeps hounding him.

19.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Dekapan invents a liquid that causes people to switch psyches when they bump heads.
19.TitleJapanese: オツムの中味が入れかわる

20.SummaryEnglish: Iyami and Chibita build a watermelon bomb to get revenge against Osomatsu and his brothers.
20.TitleJapanese: イヤミのアブナイ時計屋さん

21.TitleEnglish: Friendship! Chibita and the Cat Thief!
21.SummaryEnglish: Kindhearted newspaper delivery boy Chibita takes in a thieving cat and tries to rehabilitate it.
21.TitleJapanese: 友情!! チビ太とドロボウ猫

22.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious gunslinger, Chibita, shows up at the Dekapan Ranch just in time to drive off six bullying brothers.
22.TitleJapanese: チビ太はさすらいのガンマン

23.SummaryEnglish: When Osomatsu and the gang are invited for dinner at Iyami's posh mansion, a mystery ensues.
23.TitleJapanese: 名探偵! ハタ坊だジョー

24.TitleEnglish: Iyami's Body is Full of Germs!
24.SummaryEnglish: Totoko becomes infected with personality-altering bacteria from Iyami's body.
24.TitleJapanese: イヤミの体はバイキンだらけ

25.TitleEnglish: The Curse of Oden is Scary-zansu!
25.SummaryEnglish: Chibita is framed for stealing oden.
25.TitleJapanese: おでんの恨みは怖いザンス!

26.SummaryEnglish: Dad struggles with quitting smoking after he nearly starts a fire in the house.
26.TitleJapanese: 父さんもタバコがやめられる

27.TitleEnglish: The Fairy Tale of Outie Island!
27.SummaryEnglish: On Outie Island, Dekapan and Hatabou work hard to make offerings to a stone god, while Iyami and everyone else enjoys the good life.

28.SummaryEnglish: When the sextuplets and Totoko go camping, they encounter Iyami, a wild man of the forest.
28.TitleJapanese: 野生のイヤミに気をつけろ!

29.TitleEnglish: It's Do or Die for an Insurance Agent!
29.SummaryEnglish: Iyami starts an insurance company, thinking he'll take people's money and run.
29.TitleJapanese: 保険屋さんは命がけザンス!

30.SummaryEnglish: Chibita comes back to town seeking vengeance after training in the mountains to be a ninja.
30.TitleJapanese: 忍者チビ太、ただいま参上!

31.TitleEnglish: Up to Here with the Spirit of the Flower-zansu!
31.SummaryEnglish: The honest, hardworking Chibita is constantly targeted by the lazy thief, Iyami, but one day he finds a magical rose that changes his life.
31.TitleJapanese: 花の精にはこりごりザンス!

32.TitleEnglish: Totoko is the Number One Idol-zansu!
32.SummaryEnglish: When a pretty girl moves next door to Osomatsu and his brothers, Totoko is deposed as the neighborhood's number one idol.
32.TitleJapanese: トト子はアイドルNo.1ザンス

33.SummaryEnglish: Iyami and Chibita are best friends and trapeze artists at a third-rate circus, but Totoko, the ringmaster's daughter, comes between them.
33.TitleJapanese: 男の友情はあついザンス!

34.SummaryEnglish: Exhausted and feeling unloved by his six sons, Dad runs away from home and pledges to raise fellow runaway Chibita.
34.TitleJapanese: 父さんは、父さんなんだぞ!

35.TitleEnglish: The Tomboy Princess of Dekapan Castle!
35.SummaryEnglish: In the Edo era, Minister Iyami secretly plots to have Princess Totoko assassinated so his own son, Hatabou, can take the reins of power.
35.TitleJapanese: デカパン城のオテンバ姫!

36.TitleEnglish: It's Tough Being a Champion of Justice-zansu!
36.SummaryEnglish: Oden Chibita X fights for love, justice and truth, but then Buck Teeth Man gets in on the act and steals his thunder.
36.TitleJapanese: 正義の味方はつらいザンス

37.SummaryEnglish: Chibita sets off for adventure with his grandfather's treasure map in hand, but is soon captured by pirates.

38.SummaryEnglish: Iyami and Chibita pose as a poor elderly couple in order to sponge off of Osomatsu's family.
38.TitleJapanese: お年寄りをいたわるザンス!

39.SummaryEnglish: After feudal lord Hatabou is forced into committing seppuku, his loyal retainers, led by Chibita, plot revenge against the power-hungry Iyami.
39.TitleJapanese: 討ち入りには、ご用心ザンス

40.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu and his brothers are forced to babysit their dad's boss's violent, insomniac son.
40.TitleJapanese: 子守りはつらい仕事ザンス

41.SummaryEnglish: Chibita is a bellboy working at the Dayon Hotel when he takes in Totoko, a poor girl who's lost her beautiful singing voice.
41.TitleJapanese: 摩天楼のホワイトクリスマス

42.SummaryEnglish: Chibita becomes apprentice to Iyami, a small-time con man, but their plans go awry when they swindle, Dayon, an off-duty police officer.
42.TitleJapanese: イヤミのインチキ商売ザンス

43.SummaryEnglish: The usual gang competes in a wacky car race to sweep the wealthy Totoko off her feet.
43.TitleJapanese: レースはズルして勝つザンス

44.SummaryEnglish: French director Iyami and his cameraman Chibita travel to Japan to film a documentary on the "real Japan."
44.TitleJapanese: イヤミのデタラメ日本ザンス

45.SummaryEnglish: Pretending to be a ski instructor, Iyami goes to a resort with Osomatsu and his brothers, but runs afoul of Chibita, a former co-worker with a grudge.
45.TitleJapanese: スキー旅行はチビチイザンス

46.SummaryEnglish: Detective Chibita is transferred to a town where oden is prohibited, but is sold in a black market controlled by a shady character.
46.TitleJapanese: ねっけつ! チビ太刑事ザンス

47.SummaryEnglish: Iyami is stunned to find he's won a lottery jacpot on a ticket he made his pal Chibita purchase a year earlier, but only has one day left to collect.
47.TitleJapanese: 宝くじで大金持ちザンス!

48.TitleEnglish: The Boys Learn Manners at a Zen Temple!
48.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu and his brothers are sent to a zen temple to be straightened out by Iyami, a monk who's in it for the money.
48.TitleJapanese: ゼン寺修行で六つ子もよい子

49.SummaryEnglish: Iyami is a crooked police officer who plays pachinko, steals fruit and tries to pick up women while he's on duty.
49.TitleJapanese: お巡りさんでいばるザンス!

50.SummaryEnglish: In the primitive age, Chibita is a cook at Iyami's dinosaur egg omelet restaurant when he finds a baby T-rex that he wants to keep as a pet.
50.TitleJapanese: 恐竜たまごのオムレツザンス!

51.TitleEnglish: What Happens at the Inn Stays at the Inn-zansu!
51.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu and his family stay at a cheap inn while on vacation, but realize too late that it's actually an extrememly expensive place way beyond their budget.
51.TitleJapanese: 旅のハジはかきすてザンス!

52.SummaryEnglish: Dr. Hatabou creates an explosive lie detector belt for inveterate liar Iyami, which painfully straightens out the con artist, but that causes even more chaos.
52.TitleJapanese: 正しいイヤミはめいわくダス

53.SummaryEnglish: When Iyami and the sextuplets' father are both up for an important promotion, the president has his son, Chibita, decide who it'll be after playing golf with Iyami and Osomatsu
53.TitleJapanese: ゴマすりゴルフで出世ザンス

54.SummaryEnglish: Poverty-stricken Iyami falls for a beautiful, wealthy young woman who feels the same way about him, except she has no idea just how poor he is.
54.TitleJapanese: イヤミさんの結婚式だジョー

55.TitleEnglish: Luck Ran Out on the Drive.
55.SummaryEnglish: Dad and the boys have major troubles when they encounter Iyami while on the road in their "new" decrepit used car.
55.TitleJapanese: ドライブしたのがウンのつき

56.SummaryEnglish: Iyami has a hard time trying to change all the restaurants in town to oden joints in order to please the mega-rich Chibita.
56.TitleJapanese: 大富豪チビ太さまザンス!

57.SummaryEnglish: Iyami pilots a rickety plane to Hawaii, but it gets hijacked en route.
57.TitleJapanese: イヤミのヒコーキ野郎ザンス

58.TitleEnglish: Sheee! A 50,000 Yen a Day Allowance!
58.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu is adopted by the wealthy Dekapan and his wife, but finds them to be overprotective, to say the least.
58.TitleJapanese: シェ～! こずかい毎日五万円

59.TitleEnglish: Hatabou is a Champion of Justice-dajou!
59.SummaryEnglish: Presidential candidate Iyami hires hitman Jou Hatabou to take out his rival, Dayon.
59.TitleJapanese: ハタ坊は正義の味方だジョー

60.SummaryEnglish: Chibita and Iyami take revenge against the bullying Osomatsu and his brothers via remote-controlled model airplanes.
60.TitleJapanese: 空とぶチビ太の仕返しザンス

61.TitleEnglish: Which is More Important, Oden or Your First Love?
61.SummaryEnglish: Chibita is smitten with Jajako, Hatabou's cousin, but she hates his favorite thing in the world, oden.
61.TitleJapanese: おでんと初恋どちらがだいじ

62.SummaryEnglish: When Dad loses his bonus, suspicion quickly falls on Iyami, who's actually turned over a new leaf.
62.TitleJapanese: パパのボーナスどこいった?

63.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu unwittingly makes a duplicate of himself in Dr. Iyami's three-dimensional copy machine.
63.TitleJapanese: ゾロゾロ六つ子が一ダース!

64.SummaryEnglish: The powerful, rambunctious Chibita Songoku is imprisoned under a rock for 500 years before being rescued by an ambitious monk, Iyami.
64.TitleJapanese: ちびざるチビ太の大冒険!

65.SummaryEnglish: Iyami seeks to steal Totoko Buddha's sutras so he can kickstart his own religion, but they're alread held as collateral by moneylender and Chibita's former master, Hatabou.
65.TitleJapanese: トト子のわがままオシャカ様

66.SummaryEnglish: Nasty teacher Iyami is tormented by Chibita, the one student who dotes on him.
66.TitleJapanese: イヤミの教師ビンビン物語!?

67.TitleEnglish: Life is Tough for Prince Chibita!
67.SummaryEnglish: Stifled by his royal burdens and constant handlers, Prince Chibiru slips the leash and finds action in a local department store as he gives chase to a pickpocket, Iyami.
67.TitleJapanese: チビ太の王子様はつらいよ

68.SummaryEnglish: Dad and the boys think they're getting a good deal by hanging out at Iyami's Beach House, but the owner and his assistant, Chibita, gouge their guests for everything they're worth.
68.TitleJapanese: イヤミのインチキ海の家!

69.SummaryEnglish: Mom and Dad get to start their lives over again thanks to a magic wish that reverts them to teenagers.
69.TitleJapanese: 魔法を使って若がえるザンス

70.SummaryEnglish: Oden stand owner Chibita trains to fight the Akatsukadai boxing champion, Iyami.
70.TitleJapanese: ボクシングって痛いザンス!

71.SummaryEnglish: It's a war between the parents when Dad becomes frustrated that Mom is a better salesperson than he is.
71.TitleJapanese: 母さんは天才セールスマン!?

72.SummaryEnglish: Honeybee Chibita is in search of his long-lost mother, but his quest is impeded by a trickster, Iyami Katydid, and the ravenous Dayon Spider.
72.TitleJapanese: みつばちチビ太のバイオリン

73.SummaryEnglish: Ridde Temple Master Dekapan gives monks Iyami and Chibita the challenge of stumping locals with riddles.
73.TitleJapanese: トトコは天才なぞなぞ少女!

74.TitleEnglish: Detective Iyami versus Phantom Thief Dayon!
74.SummaryEnglish: Inspector Chibita teams up with "great detective" Iyami to capture Phantom Thief Dayon.
74.TitleJapanese: 探偵イヤミ対怪人ダヨン面相

75.SummaryEnglish: 30 years later, Osomatsu and his brothers are middle-aged salarymen scientists slaving away under their boss, Dekapan, and his demanding daughter, Totoko.
75.TitleJapanese: 四十年後のイヤミザンス!

76.TitleEnglish: Deformed in Front of the Camera-zansu!
76.SummaryEnglish: Iyami is driven mad by the desperate measures he takes to sell lousy camera film for his failing company.
76.TitleJapanese: カメラの前でべろ〜んザンス

77.SummaryEnglish: Dekapan invents an artificially intelligent vaccum cleaner that goes out of control and threatens to destroy the country.
77.TitleJapanese: おそうじロボのソージ君ダス

78.TitleEnglish: God, Make My Wish Come True!
78.SummaryEnglish: God (Dekapan) grants Chibita the power to make all of his wishes come true.
78.TitleJapanese: 神さまお願いきいてチョ

79.SummaryEnglish: Chibita's mother comes back into his life by having him kidnapped away from Dekapan, the poor man who raised him.
79.TitleJapanese: チビ太のまぶたの母ザンス

80.SummaryEnglish: With winter on its way, Iyami wants to be jailed for the sake of shelter and warm meals, but all of his attempted crimes turn into good deeds.
80.TitleJapanese: イヤミの冬ごもり作戦ザンス

81.TitleEnglish: Raking It In As a Quack!
81.SummaryEnglish: Would-be burglar Iyami is drafted into posing as the director of a hospital, a ruse that works until he's forced to treat a yakuza boss.
81.TitleJapanese: ニセ医者でぼろもうけザンス

82.SummaryEnglish: Iyami is haunted in his dreams by the spirit of a vengeful samurai, Chibita.
82.TitleJapanese: 怖い夢は見たくないザンス!

83.SummaryEnglish: When Iyami's circus goes out of business, he gives the lion to the Matsuno family, which doesn't sit well with Chibita, the lion's only friend.
83.TitleJapanese: 怒ると怖いライオンザンス!

84.SummaryEnglish: In ancient Japan, secret retired vice-shogun Hatabou and his companions go up against crooked magistrate Iyami.
84.TitleJapanese: ハタ坊の水戸黄門だジョー

85.SummaryEnglish: To prepare for invading Earth, aliens abduct Iyami and sift through memories of his worst moments.
85.TitleJapanese: また来たザンスよエイリアン

86.SummaryEnglish: In the final episode, when everyone wants to beat up Iyami and Chibita, it seems their only escape is a long swim across the Pacific.
86.TitleJapanese: イヤミの選挙必勝法ザンス
